activities: Alya is a B2B company providing Internet of Things services that allow our customers, typically device manufacturers, to enable their end customer to connect and control the device via the internet.  Ayla works with WiFi module vendors to supply pre-loaded Wi-Fi modules to the device manufacturers; a cloud site that allows manufacturers to monitor and update devices connected by the customers to their (typically home) Wi-Fi networks; and software to help manufactures build smart phone apps to control the connected devices.

personaldata: No data is manually processed.  End user's first & last name, country, email address, wi-fi network, location of wi-fi network, phone number, company, city, state, postal code and location of mobile devices using OEM's app to connect to Ayla's cloud-based service.  Our OEM customers may chose to collect other data which would be stored in our facility.
